description:
Migrate 075 appears to do some fanciness which breaks under sa-migrate 0.7.1: http://paste.openstack.org/show/4735/

Upgrading sqlalchemy and sa-migrate fixes this; so we should require >= the latest.


$ pip freeze | grep lchem

SQLAlchemy==0.7.3
sqlalchemy-migrate==0.7.2
title: Require SA-Migrate 0.7.2 and SA 0.7.3 or greater

comments.content:
Migrate 075 appears to do some fanciness which breaks under sa-migrate 0.7.1: http://paste.openstack.org/show/4735/

Upgrading sqlalchemy and sa-migrate fixes this; so we should require >= the latest.

sqlalchemy-migrate==0.7.2
